name: S_4_1_1_Capture_Genomic_Proteomic_Data_and_Documentation_from_External_Clinical_Sources
title: S.4.1.1 Capture Genomic/Proteomic Data and Documentation from External Clinical Sources (Function)
description: Incorporate genomic/proteomic data and documentation from external sources.
purpose: Mechanisms for incorporating external genomic/proteomic data and documentation (including identification of source) such as image documents, reports and other clinically relevant electronic data are available.

statement.label: S.4.1.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture relevant family genomic history.

statement.label: S.4.1.1#02
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture and maintain genomic/proteomic information through interaction with other systems, applications, and modules.

statement.label: S.4.1.1#03
statement.requirement: IF laboratory results are received through an electronic interface, THEN the system SHALL render the data elements upon request.

statement.label: S.4.1.1#04
statement.requirement: IF laboratory results are received through an electronic interface, THEN the system SHALL capture and maintain the data elements in the PHR Account Holder record.

statement.label: S.4.1.1#05
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to store imaged documents.

statement.label: S.4.1.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to manage text-based externally-sourced documents and reports.
